result:
#menuBar
    
    display: flex
    flex-wrap: nowrap
    justify-content: flex-end
    padding: 10px
    padding-top: 10px
@media all and (min-width: 660px)
    .menuItem
        margin: 10px
        display: block
    .menuIconContainer
        display: none
    .drawerItem
        display: none

@media all and (max-width: 660px)
    .menuItem
        display: none
    .menuIconContainer
        display: block
    .drawerItem
        display: block


.menuIconBar1, .menuIconBar2, .menuIconBar3
    width: 35px
    height: 3px
    background-color: #333
    transition: 0.3s
    margin: 6px
    position: relative
    border-radius: 25px
.menuIconContainer
    cursor: pointer
    

.drawerItem
    padding: 10px
    cursor: pointer
.drawerItem:hover
    background-color: #FFC53D

.router-link-active
    background: #F5DC79
    border-radius: 50px
    padding: 5px

sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">

div#menuWrapper
    div#menuBar
        div.menuItem(v-for='item in menuList')
            router-link(:to='item.link' style="color: #333; text-decoration:none;") {{item.title}}
        .menuIconContainer(@click='drawerStatus = !drawerStatus')
            .menuIconBar1
            .menuIconBar2
            .menuIconBar3
    div.meunDrawer(v-if='drawerStatus')
        div.drawerItem(v-for='item in menuList') 
            router-link(:to='item.link' style="color: black; text-decoration:none;") {{item.title}}


</template>


<script>
export default {
    data() {
        return {
            drawerStatus: false

        }
    },
    props: ['menu-list'],

    
    methods: {

    }
}       
</script>

<style lang="sass">
#menuBar
    
    display: flex
    flex-wrap: nowrap
    justify-content: flex-end
    padding: 10px
    padding-top: 10px
@media all and (min-width: 660px)
    .menuItem
        margin: 10px
        display: block
    .menuIconContainer
        display: none
    .drawerItem
        display: none

@media all and (max-width: 660px)
    .menuItem
        display: none
    .menuIconContainer
        display: block
    .drawerItem
        display: block


.menuIconBar1, .menuIconBar2, .menuIconBar3
    width: 35px
    height: 3px
    background-color: #333
    transition: 0.3s
    margin: 6px
    position: relative
    border-radius: 25px
.menuIconContainer
    cursor: pointer
    

.drawerItem
    padding: 10px
    cursor: pointer
.drawerItem:hover
    background-color: #FFC53D

.router-link-active
    background: #F5DC79
    border-radius: 50px
    padding: 5px

</style>
